duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct leadership and personnel management of a team of engineers within the department.
Lead projects developing artificial intelligence/machine learning based algorithms for data fusion, object identification, tracking, autonomy, navigation, data pre-processing and conditioning.
Identify technology capabilities to support various business units within the organization and externally funded research and development projects.
Partner closely with business development personnel to provide technical inputs to strategic growth opportunities.
Provide technical expertise in technology roadmap development and lay out roadmaps for AI/algorithm capabilities to be developed and inserted into products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree is required, Master’s Degree is desired. Specific Degree Field: Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Systems Engineering, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related
